fillafulla-lead:
Take part in an interactive conversation and explore life stories and key artworks of the iconic Czech and Slovak artists Emil Filla and Ľudovít Fulla. Throughout the chat, both artists will answer questions and share artworks as well as archival material.
What will you talk about?
fillafulla-share-long:
Enjoyed chatting with Filla and Fulla?
Share it with friends via email or social media
fillafulla-footer-text: The exhibition Filla — Fulla | Fate of the Artist is part of the joint project with the Moravian Gallery in Brno, Made in Czechoslovakia, dedicated to the centennial anniversary of the founding of Czechoslovakia.
